description: This template represents a generic question with categorical values as answers.

answer.description: Define the answer type: basic type, categorical or unit-value pair (see also generic-question-by-cardinality template).

oneOf.description: Define type as needed: string, integer, number, date, etc.
Enumerate the code/text pairs inside the enum: for example 'code': 1, 'text': 'not useful'
Reference the appropriate unit_value schema, if it already exists (for ex., duration-unit-value for time) and, if applicable, subset the unit of measures, or define a unit-value schema as needed.

date_time.description: Create one property for each of the question-level timestamp you need: for ex., date_time_asked, date_time_answered.
